RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KATIE'S C behind the early pace along the inside, crept closer in the turn while well in hand, angled out a bit and engaged the winner entering the stretch, disposed of that one and drew clear. THROUGH THE CRACKS with the pace out of the chute inside, continued to vie into the turn, briefly shook clear late in the turn, joined by the winner soon after, offered brief resistance then could not keep up. STOP SHOP N DROP lacked speed inside, cut the corner into the lane to improve position, finished best of the rest while not a threat to the top two late. DARING DARIAN back off the pace, moved closer four wide into the lane, also flattened out in the final furlong. SARATOGA KAREN vied up front while three wide up the backstretch and into the turn, began to weaken late in the turn. AUNT JANA last away, trailed much of the way, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. LUCKY HARBORAGE was finished early. SLIDE vied up front early while between foes, stopped early in the turn, distanced late after losing contact with the field, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Jana
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, passed a couple of tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Stop Shop N Drop
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, cut corner, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's C
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace inside,closer turn in hand, outside bid, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Stewart M. Madison & Channon Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Through the Cracks
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, briefly clear late turn, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Slide
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied btwn foes, stopped early in the turn, distanced, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Harborage
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Karen
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front three wide, weakened turning for home

ENTRY.NAME: Daring Darian
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer 4w into lane, flattened out final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 1, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 1, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claimin g Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUITAR TRIBUTE outrun for six furlongs while moving out, came five wide for the drive, rallied down the middle of the strip and closed with good resolve to be up in time. PAYDAY TOO back off the pace, moved closer toward the inside second turn, switched out for room when straightened for home, also finished willingly while well out in the strip only to miss. HELLUVA LIFE in the second flight off the inside, ranged up to challenge four wide in the second turn, vied into and through upper stretch, not enough for the top two late. MUFFIN NUTS dueled up front along the inside, continued to vie while closest to the inside stretch, weakened. GALLANT STAR last to leave, recovered quickly to move up to a forward position before a quarter, challenged three wide and between horses second turn, held a slight advantage past the furlong marker then faltered late. OUTLAW X. dueled up front, gave way in the second turn. BINDING fell back to trail after the start, never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Payday Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer inside, switched out, willingly, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, moved out, 5w into lane, rallied widest, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Muffin Nuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, vied inside, weakened late to miss show

ENTRY.NAME: Binding
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, moved up, forward, 3w bid 2nd, led, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 4w bid 2nd, not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Outlaw X.
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front, gave way second turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 1, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 1, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 1, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IZZY'S BABY BOY tracked the leader from the outside up the backstretch, asked along in the turn, began to rally entering the stretch while remaining outside, closed with good resolve to collar the winner late. JAZZ IT UP pressed the issue early off the inside, advanced and lodged a bid midway on the turn, took over, clear past the furlong marker, could not contan the winner, remained clear for the second spot. TANGO CHARLIE in mid pack early, advanced through the turn along the inside, slowly gaining for the second spot late. GETCHA fell back to trail after the start, four wide through the turn, improved position through the stretch, no threat to the top three. MONZZA forwardly placed early while breaking in good order, faded. QUEST FOR AVETTE broke on top, set the early pace, raced on equal terms with the winner late turn then began to weaken when headed by that one into the stretch. COMPLEX SYSTEM was finished early, well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Quest for Avette
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Complex System
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well back

ENTRY.NAME: Monzza
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tango Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack, advanced inside, slow gain 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Getcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 4w turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early off the inside, bid, took over into lane, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Baby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, asked along turn, kicked down leader late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER ON THE TURF OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or O ver Since June 1, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since May 1, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR MOMENT stalked the pace three wide, challenged on the outside into the far turn, vied, kicked clear into the lane, maintained daylight to the end under steady handling. ALLIACEOUS unhurried early, advanced into a striking position far turn, chased the winner upper stretch, could not get to that one while drifting out in midstretch, clearly second best. MISS JANA broke in then steadied to be last away, continued to trail first turn, closer four wide second turn, continued with a mild rally to capture the show while not a threat to the top two. OUR LITTLE GIRL back early, continued to lag second turn, four wide into the lane while still able to see them all, staged a belated rally well out in the course to be gaining for the show. SNOWBALL rank in the first turn then steadied toward the inside, raced in mid pack up the backstretch, checked up in traffic into the far turn, went evenly through the lane after recovering. STRUMMER back off the pace toward the inside, bothered then was steadied in traffic far turn, fell back and failed to threaten through the lane. CRIDER CHASE dueled up front off the inside, extended that advantage before a half, vied into the final bend, faltered in the drive. BLESSED ASSURANCE dueled early along the inside, began a steady fade after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Snowball
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank, std'd 1st turn, traffic, checked 3/8, even drive

ENTRY.NAME: Blessed Assurance
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early inside, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Crider Chase
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early off the inside, larger lead, faltered drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Strummer
ENTRY.OWNER: Oak Tree Stables LLC (Powell and O'Brien)
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, bothered, steadied 3/8, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Star Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early 3w, outside bid, kicked clear stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Alliaceous
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, advanced 2nd turn, chased, drifted, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jana
ENTRY.OWNER: Arnaud Thomas L and Cassedy Allen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,steadied,trailed,4w far turn, mild rally, no match top 2

ENTRY.NAME: Our Little Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, 4w into lane, gaining for the show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTTEMINABIND dueled early off the inside, disposed of that foe in the turn before being joined from the outside by the winner into the stretch, long drive, proved best by digging late in game fashion. ZIPPING MOLLY in the second flight up the backstretch, engaged the winner from the outside late in the turn, spirited stretch duel, outgamed late, well clear of the others. ZONG WAVE in mid pack for a half, advanced to be closest to the top two out of the turn in the three path, proved no match for that pair to the wire, well clear of the others. SUNSET FLASH void of speed, moved out, was five wide out of the turn, turned a mild rally down the middle of the strip to improve position. MINT JULIUS bumped at the start, lacked any early foot, three wide and in some traffic into the stretch, improved position. BRITNEY B. within striking distance early, fell back three wide through the turn then went evenly through the stretch. LA LOLA in the second group early, chased the top two late in the turn then began to weaken. LOVE CREED settled in mid pack early, had nothing for the drive. DREAMED I AM FAST dueled up the backstretch inside the winner, gave way early in the turn. MALLORY UNBRIDLED was never dangerous. LUCCA'S LILYBY broke through the gate prior to the start, reloaded, broke in, bumped inner foes, was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, moved out, mild rally 5w

ENTRY.NAME: Mint Julius
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, raced back, traffic, 3w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Lucca's Lilyby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate, broke in, bumped foe, always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamed I Am Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up backstretch inside, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Zipping Molly
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, outside bid, long stretch drive, outgame

ENTRY.NAME: Gotteminabind
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 2p,2nd duel into and through stretch,long drive,game

ENTRY.NAME: Mallory Unbridled
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Love Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had nothing for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Britney B.
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance 2nd flight, fell back turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: La Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel late turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Zong Wave
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, advanced 3w, no match top two, clear rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Opelousas S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 99. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. No nomination, with $400 to enter and $200 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entry. $60,000 guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake's structure payout percen tages per field size. Weights: Three-year-olds 119 lbs. Older 124 lbs. non-winners of a sweepstake at a mile or over since Feb. 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., non-winners of two races other than maiden, claiming, or starter at a mile or over in 2023 5 lbs., suc h a race since April 1, 2023, 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022 - 2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. T rophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAKNTOTHECLEANERS close from the start, took command from between horses into the far turn, clear by late in the bend, steadily drew out through the straight under steady handling. CHEAPSKATE DIVA within striking distance, moved closer to the winner in the three path late in the final turn, proved no match for that one through the stretch, well clear for the place. ANOTHER HOT MESS void of speed while saving some ground, began to move into the far turn, came four wide for the drive, rallied to be in time for the show, not a threat to the top pair. EVE'S DELIGHT settled in mid pack, saved some ground second turn, moved out for the drive, advanced to race closest to the top two past the furlong marker, flattened out a bit and was caught for the show. WHOLELOTTAMO back off the pace, was floated out a bit by ANOTHER HOT MESS turning for home while unable to keep pace with that one into the lane, improved a bit late while not a serious threat. SKYKAT void of speed, continued to lag through the second turn, showed some belated interest while not a serious threat. CAVE CREEK settled in mid pack, came up empty for the drive. GATHER AS YOU GO broke on top, set the pace along the inside, gave way in the second turn. TEASIN' TESLA away in good order, pressed, stopped. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF WHOLELOTTAMO AGAINST ANOTHER HOT MESS FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE EXITING THE FINAL TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Eve's Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in midpack, saved ground 2nd,advanced,caught 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Another Hot Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, moved out far turn, 4w into lane, rallied 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Gather as You Go
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top,pace inside, gave way 2nd turn

ENTRY.NAME: Wholelottamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, floated 4w into lane, improved bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Takntothecleaners
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and S B Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, took command from btwn far turn, kicked clr

ENTRY.NAME: Cave Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Skykat
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, lagged into lane, belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Cheapskate Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer 3w 1/4, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Teasin' Tesla
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, pressed, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 1, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 1, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races N ot Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILENT POWER unhurried early just off the inside, moved closer second turn, challenged from between rivals turning for home, dueled past the furlong marker inside the runner up then outfinished that one late in a determined effort. FATHER RED lacked speed, advanced and challenged four wide turning into the stretch, dueled past the furlong marker outside the winner, outkicked in the late going, fully extended to hold the place. RICKY BOBBY fell back to trail well back early, continued to lack speed into the far turn, came four wide fore the drive, steady gain on the runner up late, well clear of the others. NO WHITE FLAGS broke through the gate prior to the start, balked at reloading, broke with the field, settled, closer between rivals late in the final turn, flattened out a bit through the lane to finish up evenly. BRITE OUTLOOK moved up to duel inside, put the other speed away by midway on the final turn to be briefly clear, caved in when headed in upper stretch. FAHAN forwardly placed early, shuffled back from between the two frontrunners in the first turn, chased that pair onto the backstretch, was finished after a half. EUROBELIEVER dueled up front off the inside, stopped second turn, jogged in well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Brite Outlook
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to duel inside, briefly clear late 2nd, caved in drive

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, advanced, btwn foes into lane, determined

ENTRY.NAME: No White Flags
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gate,balked reloading,settled, brief bid 1/4,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Ricky Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w into lane, gaining outside

ENTRY.NAME: Father Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w advance, bid into lane,dueled, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Fahan
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, shuffled back bit first turn, chased, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Eurobeliever
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off the inside, stopped second turn, jogged in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: John Henry S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 101. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. No nomination, with $400 to enter and $200 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1200 will be accepted at time of entry. $60,000 guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake's structure payout percentages per field si ze. Weights: Three-year-olds 119 lbs. Older 124 lbs. non-winners of a sweepstake at a mile or over since Feb. 1, 2023, allowed 3 lbs., non-winners of two races other than maiden, claiming, or starter at a mile or over in 2023 5 lbs., such a race since Apr il 1, 2023, 7 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022 - 2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning o wner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONAASIB unhurried past the wire the first time in the two path, continued back under light restraint up the backstretch, picked way inside and through traffic under clever handling through the second turn, prominent into the lane, split foes, took over a furlong out, extended that advantage a bit halfway to the wire, enough left to withstand the runner up in the final strides. WOODS N WATER settled off the pace while off the inside, also rated in the run up the backstretch, advanced into contention on the outside second turn, was five wide into the lane to lose ground to the winner,continued to advance past the furlong marker, saw that progress stall a bit a sixteenth out, late push at the wire to be getting to the winner, missed. BUDRO TALKING void of early foot, began to advance from between horses into the far turn, traffic through that bend, was five wide and behind the runner up into the stretch, finished willingly late to be getting to that rival and the winner in the late going. FIRST GLIMPSE forward, four wide behind the two leaders turning for home, four wide bid upper straight, vied past the furlong marker then went flat late. FORTUITY closest to the leader, took over in the two path late in the final bend, vied past the furlong marker closest to the rail and weakened. PEACOCK KITTEN lacked speed, continued well back while three wide through the final turn, showed some belated interest to improve position. STRONG EAGLE in mid pack early, fell back near the back the middle half, bettered position a bit through the stretch without posing a serious threat. INTIMIDATION void of speed while inside, continued to save ground through the second bend, improved position while also never seriously menacing. MUNQAD away in good order, cleared before a quarter, set the pace for six furlongs, gave way when headed late in the final turn. MACHINE GUN MAN within striking distance for six furlongs, backed up through the stretch. CHROME BABY three wide when in mid pack through the first turn, continued outside and tired while five to six wide in the second bend.

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuity
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, took over 2p, weakened inside drive

ENTRY.NAME: Intimidation
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground inside, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Budro Talking
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, traffic 2nd turn, 5w into lane,willingly late

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, fell back middle half,. improved bit stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Peacock Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 3w 2nd turn, late interest, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Woods N Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack outside, 5w into, late bid, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Monaasib
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, picked way thru traffic 2nd turn, bid btwn, held late

ENTRY.NAME: First Glimpse
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w bid upper stretch, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, tired six wide 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Munqad
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, cleared,faltered when headed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TROSKA in the second flight while between foes into the turn, advanced along the inside, dueled, wore down the early leader inside that one to edge clear late. KRAZY KATIE broke through the gate prior to the start, reloaded, broke sharp, quickly clear, responded when challenged by the winner while outside that one, remained clear for the place. STRUMMIN MARY in the second flight along the inside, had little for the top two in the drive, finished up best of the rest. DEE'S LIL FOOL fell back to trail after the start, continued to see them all out of the turn well off the inside, steered out to be widest for the drive, improved position with some late interest. IAM DAKOTA in the second group while outside, weakened in the drive. NATURALBORNSENDER steadied at the break to be last away, improved into the lane, went flat the final furlong. PLEADING GUILTY failed to menace. LADY KRISTEN steadied a bit at the break, midpack, faded through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Strummin Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Lil Fool
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, steered out, stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Troska
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, between foes turn, inside bid, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Katie
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, broke sharp, quickly clear, grudgingly, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Pleading Guilty
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Naturalbornsender
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, back, improved into lane,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Kristen
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied bit break, mid pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Iam Dakota
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group outside, weakened
